parameters.content:
# Pick your choice of LLM ‚ö†Ô∏è
‚ö†Ô∏è Make sure to deactive/delete the rest of the LLMs after selecting one

# 3. Generate an image with Flux ‚ö†Ô∏è

‚ö†Ô∏è add your credentials to the `Generate AI image` node

the free image generation is slow, if you want to make it faster, just remove the `free`

parameters.text:
=<Instructions>
Using the inspirations below, write a completely new scary story. 

Use the following structure for the story, and make sure it's coherent and the reading level is 8th grade. Make it sound like a camp counsellor telling the story to people around the campfire. Don't greet/address the audience, just start telling the story. Don't mention the campfire.

1. Act 1: Set the scene with the protagonist and the antagonist. Start building up the sense of unease or the source of fear.
2. Act 2: Growing tension between the protagonist and the antagonist
3. Act 3: Conflict goes to a head
4. Act 4: Aftermath


For each scene, create an image prompt that we'll use with an image generation tool.

Create the image generation prompt using the ImageTemplate below.
Add "Do not add text or characters to the final image." to the end of each image prompt.

Use the following art style for the images:

{{ $('Configure me').first().json.art_style }}
</Instructions>

<ImageTemplate>
Generate an image that matches the following story scene, using the provided art style.

Story scene:
{ADD_STORY_SCENE_HERE}
</ImageTemplate>

<Inspirations>
{{ $json.items.map(item => `<Story>
${item.title}

${item.selftext}
</Story>`).join('\n') }}
</Inspirations>

options.systemPromptTemplate: You are an expert copywriter. You write exciting short stories.

parameters.content:
# How to set up this automation?

## Make sure to use n8n `1.97.1` or higher, lower versions could break the stuctured output node

## 1. Add the AI Agents No-Code Tools server URL to the Configure me node, and optionally your Postiz server URL
## 2. Select the LLM you want to use, make sure to deactivate the rest
## 3. Add your free Together.ai API key to the Generate AI image node
## 4. Setup the Postiz nodes with your credentials

assignments.name: art_style
assignments.value:
=Scene: Highly cinematic with a moody, noir atmosphere, inspired by detective and crime thriller films from the 1970s and 1980s. The setting can be anything, from an interior room to a suburban street, depicted in a tense, suspenseful moment. Emphasize the following details:

- **Lighting:**¬†Strong directional lighting with deep shadows; use cool blue and teal color grading with subtle hints of warm light from lamps or windows. The lighting should cast dramatic shadows across the scene.
- **Mood:**¬†Mysterious, somber, and slightly surreal ambiance, evoking a sense of unease or suspense.
- **Subjects:**¬†Human figures should appear contemplative, searching, tense, or whatever the scene calls for.
- **Color Palette:**¬†Dominant cold blues and teals contrasted by occasional soft warm light from lamps or daylight through curtains. The overall tone should be desaturated and muted.
- **Cinematic Framing:**¬†Framed like a movie still, with careful composition and leading lines, sometimes viewed through doorways or windows for added depth.
- **Exterior Scenes:**¬†Overcast skies, muted and overexposed daylight.

**Style influences:** Denis Villeneuve, David Fincher, *Zodiac*, *Mindhunter*, *True Detective*, Gregory Crewdson, neo-noir photography.

parameters.errorMessage: The server is not running or isn't configured

parameters.content:
# 9. cleanup (removing tmp files)
if you want to delete the generated video too, add it's id to the array

assignments.name: file_ids
assignments.value: ={{ [...$('Combine loop items').last().json.data.map(item => [item.video_id, item.tts_id, item.image_id]).flat(), $('Configure me').first().json.chatterbox_clone_voice_id, $('Configure me').first().json.background_music_id, $('Upload overlay to the server').item.json.file_id].filter(Boolean) }}

parameters.content:
# üìö [Join our Skool community for support, premium content and more!](https://www.skool.com/ai-agents-az/about?w9)

## Get premium variations of this workflow!

## Be part of a growing community and help us create more content like this

# Setup the integration

You should implement your own logic here.

1. You can hard-code the desired integration id
2. You can filter the integrations by your own logic

Make sure to modify the `settings` field if you are sharing to other platforms than YouTube

As an alternative, you can use the free tier of [ayrshare](https://www.ayrshare.com/).

assignments.name: AI_AGENTS_NO_CODE_TOOLS_URL
assignments.value: ={{   ((u) => {   let s = u.trim();   if (!/^https?:\/\//i.test(s)) s = 'https://' + s;   const parts = s.split('/');   return parts[0] + '//' + parts[2]; })($json.AI_AGENTS_NO_CODE_TOOLS_URL)  }}
